name: Boris & la Chocolaterie
description:
"Boris & la Chocolaterie" is a 2D plateformer arcade video game made as part of a marketing project for our school association's party around the theme of "Charlie and the Chocolate factory"

Based on the 2005 movie, the game puts the player in the shoes of Boris, the association's mascot, that must wander the factory, collecting candies to earn points. But beware of the pissed-off Oompa-Lompas and don't run out of time ! Throughtout the level are Altars of Boris where the player is asked a question on the association, that can give a major bonus of points. Compete for the highest score of candies !
